Texts.((000001)): Some addons were disabled due to a game update.
Texts.((000002)): Manually re-enable them or wait for them to update.
Texts.((000012)): This addon is currently locked and requires a restart for the update to take effect.
Texts.((000017)): This addon is currently locked disabling won't take effect until next game start.
Texts.((000019)): This addon is currently locked and requires a restart to be removed.
Texts.((000021)): Addon state won't be saved. Game was started with addons via start parameters.
Texts.((000023)): * Disabling won't take effect until next game start.%s
Texts.((000036)):
Checks each addon and updates it, if available.
Some addons require a restart to apply the update and won't take effect immediately.
Texts.((000039)): These changes take effect the next time you start the game:
Texts.((000048)): If this setting is enabled the Quick Access menu will also show during loading screens and character selection.
Texts.((000049)): Show notification icon when Nexus updates
Texts.((000055)): Changing Font Size requires a restart.
Texts.((000057)):
This will read out the ImGui style settings from ArcDPS and apply them to Nexus.
Changing ArcDPS style at runtime is not reflected by Nexus as ArcDPS does only save on shutdown.
Restart required.
